question_text: Which advantage makes natural gas particularly easy to transport compared to other fossil fuels?
options: A. It can be transported through pipelines with high pressure.
B. It is easily transported by trucks in liquid form.
C. It requires no special storage conditions.
D. It can only be transported as a solid.
correct_answer: A. It can be transported through pipelines with high pressure.
explanation: Natural gas is stored under high pressure as Compressed Natural Gas (CNG), which facilitates its transport through pipelines, making it more efficient compared to other fossil fuels.
